page.title: 19BROUGHTY FERRY FOR LEISURE
page.content: The{Broughty Ferry Gala}takes place annually in July and includes competitions,sideshows,sporting fixtures and raffles.There is also an art and craft exhibition,with contributions from local artists and school children,and a raft race,with rafts made from planks,barrels etc., and manned by teams entered by various groups such as the police,scouts and local businesses. In the summer,swimmers from a club called{The Ancient Amphibians}swim the three kilometre wide River Tay and on New Year's Day they go for a dip in the Tay,breaking the ice if necessary. Several of the Ancient Amphibians have swum the English Channel. 1985 is the{Royal Tay Yacht Club's} centenary,and as well as their annual Regatta,they are holding a special Yacht Week for visiting yachtsmen.
